page.title: 08INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry as such is unknown. The largest employer for miles is the joiner and building contracor who provides jobs for 70 people. They have a large workshop,offices and stores but most of their work is on sites in the surrounding areas. There is a motor mechanic who has a large modern workshop. He employs his son and they repair cars as well as selling second hand cars. The village blacksmith works alone on all sorts of agricultural repairs. He also sharpens garden tools and is a craftsman in wrought iron. He has call on a retired farrier's services when horses need shoeing.
